The claim that Bruce Braley: voted to cut $700 billion from Medicare to support Obamacare" is a political talking point used in the Iowa Senate race.
Previous fact: checking by PolitiFact and other organizations have found claims about Obamacare cutting Medicare to be either Half True or Mostly False, depending on how they are worded.
